item.title: Delicious Homemade Chai Latte to Warm Your Heart
item.description: This homemade chai latte is a hug in a mug, perfect for chilly mornings. With spices that warm your soul, it's a family favorite for cozy weekends!

  • 2 cups water
  • 2 cups milk (or almond milk for a dairy-free option)
  • 2 tablespoons black tea leaves
  • 2 tablespoons sugar (adjust to taste)
  • 1 cinnamon stick
  • 3-4 cardamom pods, crushed
  • 1 inch fresh ginger, sliced
  • 1-2 whole cloves

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a saucepan, combine water, cinnamon stick, cardamom pods, ginger, and cloves. Bring to a boil over medium heat.
  2. Once boiling, reduce heat and add black tea leaves. Let it simmer for about 5 minutes.
  3. Add the milk and sugar, stirring to combine. Increase the heat and bring it back to a gentle boil.
  4. Remove from heat and strain the chai into mugs, discarding the spices and tea leaves.
  5. Serve hot and enjoy the cozy vibes with your family!
